subject: Order #SSN5509
description_text:
Hey, I ordered your product on 29th december and it still hasn't been
delivered. Tracking number says it's been in Lisbon since 7th january and
until today i got no more information on it. I contacted the carrier and
they told me to contact the seller directly. Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Francisco Freitas,     I'm very sorry for the delayed response.  I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326639006DE
Hi Francisco Freitas,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
